sentences.en: He rebuked Midwestern senators who had voted against the tariff bill.
sentences.cn: 他指责投票反对过关税法的中西部参议员.

sentences.en: I about the plane returning to California from the Midwestern town where my sister's family lives.
sentences.cn: 我从我妹妹家庭居住的中西部城市返回加州,在飞机上我认真想着那句话.

sentences.en: I have a friend who runs a bookstore in a Midwestern college town.
sentences.cn: 我有个朋友,他在一座中西部大学城镇上开了一家书店.

sentences.en: This was quintessential Midwestern farming country.
sentences.cn: 这就是典型的中西部农村。

trans.tran_en: Midwestern means belonging or relating to the Midwest

trans.tran_cn: 美国中西部的，有中西部的特性的
trans.tran_en: Midwestern means belonging or relating to the Midwest
